text: Kamen Rider Decade (Masked Rider DCD) is the title of first installment of the 2009 editions of the long-running Kamen Rider Series of tokusatsu dramas. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Samurai Sentai Shinkenger. ==Actors== * Tsukasa Kadoya / Kamen Rider Decade: Masahiro Inoue * Hikari Natsumi / Kamen Rider Kivala: Kanna Mori * Yusuke Onodera / Kamen Rider Kuuga: Ryota Murai * Daiki Kaito / Kamen Rider Diend: Kimito Totani * Narutaki: Tatsuhiko Okuda * Guy: Kazuhisa Kawahara * Eijiro Hikari: Renji Ishibashi * Kivala (Voice): Miyuki Sawashiro * DecaDriver Voice, DienDriver Voice, K-Touch Voice: Mark Okita * Narration: Eiichiro Suzuki ===Guest stars=== * Wataru Kurenai (1, 31): Kōji Seto * Ai Yashiro, Toko Yashiro (1-3, 12, 13): Hiroko Sato * Kamen Rider KickHopper (Voice; 2, 3): Hidenori Tokuyama * Kamen Rider PunchHopper (Voice; 2, 3): Masato Uchiyama * Wataru / Kamen Rider Kiva (4, 5, 30-31): Arashi Fukasawa * Kivat-bat the 3rd (Voice; 4, 5): Tomokazu Sugita * Ryo Itoya (4): Sohto * Kamen Rider Kaixa (Voice; 4, 5): Kōhei Murakami * Shinji Tatsumi / Kamen Rider Ryuki (6, 7): Momosuke Mizutani * Ren Haguro / Kamen Rider Knight (6, 7): Eiki Kitamura * Reiko Momoi (6, 7): Sae Takahashi * Kamata / Kamen Rider Abyss (6-9): Masato Irie * Kazuma Kendate / Kamen Rider Blade (8, 9, 30): Hiroki Suzuki * Sakuya Hishigata / Kamen Rider Garren (8, 9, 30): Yoshihiko Narimatsu * Mutsuki Kuroba / Kamen Rider Leangle (8, 9, 30): Kazuma Kawahara * Hajime Shijo / Kamen Rider Chalice (8, 9): Ruo * Ai (8, 9): Rumi Hiragi * Mai (8, 9): Yuka Kayama * Mi (8, 9): Ayano Washizu * Takumi Omagi / Kamen Rider Faiz (10, 11): Syunsuke Seino * Yuri Tomoda (10, 11): Yurie Midori * Momose (10, 11): Ryosuke Miura * Smart Brain High (10): Riho Okada * Shukawa (10, 11): Asaya Hanagata * Genda (10, 11): CHIKARA * Shirogane (10): Takuya Nagaoka * Shouichi Ashikawa / Kamen Rider Agito (12, 13): So Yamanaka * Naomi (14, 15): Rina Akiyama * Kohana (14, 15): Tamaki Matsumoto * Owner (14, 15): Kenjirō Ishimaru * Momotaros (Voice; 24): Chō * Chinomanako (Voice; 24, 25): Ryūzaburō Ōtomo * Kotaro Minami / Kamen Rider Black RX / Kamen Rider Black (26, 27): Tetsuo Kurata * Amazon / Kamen Rider Amazon (28, 29): Ernique Sakamoto * Masahiko Okamura (28, 29): Akashi Takei * Ritsuko Okamura (28, 29): Yuki Terada * Yuki (30): Yuria Haga * Kazuma Kenzaki / Kamen Rider Blade (30, 31): Takayuki Tsubaki ===All Riders vs. Dai-Shocker cast=== * Sayo Kadoya: Moe Arai * 10-year-old Tsukasa: Riku Ichikawa * 5-year- old Sayo: Momoka Ishii * Shouichi Tsugami / Kamen Rider Agito (cameo): Toshiki Kashu * Kamen Rider W (Voiced): Renn Kiriyama, Masaki Suda ===Movie War 2010 cast=== * Yuriko Misaki / Electro-Wave Human Tackle: Alice Hirose ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Journey Through the Decade" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Ryo (of defspiral) ** Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse, Ryo ** Artist: Gackt ** Episodes: Nine Worlds arc (first verse), New Worlds arc (second verse) ; Insert themes * "Ride the Wind" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Tsukasa Kadoya (Masahiro Inoue) ** Episodes: 10 - 22, 28 * "Treasure Sinper" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Ryo ** Artist: Daiki Kaito (Kimito Totani) ** Episodes: 23 - 27, 29 - 31 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2009 Japanese television series debuts Category:2009 television series endings Category:2009 disestablishments in Japan
title: Kamen Rider Decade
